thread.title: State to require disclosure from “crisis pregnancy centers”
thread.title_full: State to require disclosure from “crisis pregnancy centers” - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: State to require disclosure from “crisis pregnancy centers”
text: “Crisis pregnancy centers,” which offer free counseling and services to pregnant women but try to steer them away from abortion, are about to come under state rules requiring full disclosure of all reproductive options, unless the courts intervene. Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation Friday sponsored by abortion-rights groups and Attorney General Kamala Harris that will require the centers to tell prospective clients one of two things: Medically licensed centers, with a doctor on the staff, must describe the full range of low-cost or free reproductive services available under state law, including contraception and abortion. Those without a doctor must tell clients they are unlicensed by the state. There are 2,500 crisis pregnancy ...
